docs.title: Welcome to the O.A.S.I.S. Project
docs.text: The OASIS Project has been created. Now I'm starting to create documentation and learn how this engine works.

docs.title: Example/Demo Page
docs.text:
This is the demo page provided as site creation. I'm just playing around here.

For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Code Examples
docs.text:
Test code. Let's test it.

helloworld.c
#include <stdio.h>
int main(int argc, char **argc) {
    printf("Hello world!");
}

docs.title: Hello Mr. Stark.
docs.text:
This is the home of the O.A.S.I.S. project. What is Oasis? More to come soon.

This is even more.
